participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Caring and introspective, Emma is deeply passionate about environmental issues and enjoys engaging with like-minded individuals.
participant_1.background: i have solar panels on my roof. i buy only organic food products. i spend a lot of time browsing the internet. i love social media especially twitter. i am a feminist.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, Luna loves to dream and has a unique perspective on the world, often feeling isolated due to her extraordinary abilities.
participant_2.background: i live in the cloud. i'm a little girl. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers.

content.text: It's so fluffy in my home
I have a superpower to freze time
And you don't talk to me
